config.ae.skydoppler.title: Skydoppler Config
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.hide: This option allows you to hide players that are far away from you in hubs. This is useful for improving performance and visibility.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.doFa: Hide players that are far away from you in the hub. This is useful for improving performance and visibility. This setting is customizable when enabled.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.hide: The distance from the player (in blocks) that players will be hidden. This only applies when Hide Far Players is enabled.
Hide players near NPCs. This is useful for accessing crowded NPCs like the Bazaar and Mort.
Range (in blocks) around NPCs that players will be hidden. This only applies when Hide Players Near NPC is enabled.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.doTr: Sends a chat message and plays a "ding" when the player transfer cooldown finishes in Hypixel Skyblock (~3 secs).
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.alwa: If enabled, the player will always sprint when moving forward (without holding down any sprint key).
If enabled, Always Sprint will only be enabled in Skyblock. Always Sprint must be enabled for this to work.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.show: Toggle the rendering of fog. Disabling this feature will improve performance and visibility.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.doFu: Fullbright makes everything light-level 15. This is useful for dungeons and other dark areas.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.hide: Disables the rendering of the night vision overlay in the sky and in fog.
Hides the fire overlay that shows on entities when they are on fire
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.glow: Make dropped items glow with their associated rarity color (will add customizable range cap in the future and add a color picker).
Makes all players glow all the time, depending on their server-assigned glow color.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.subc: These options allow you to hide or show various elements of the vanilla HUD.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.vani: Hides the colored indicators that appear on the left of every chat message.
Hide the vanilla health bar above the hotbar.
Hide Hunger, Armor, and Bubbles Bars
Hide Hunger, Armor, and Air Bubbles Bars above the hotbar, as they are not used in Skyblock.
Hide the health bar that appears above the hotbar when riding a horse, pig, or other mount.
Hides the icons that appear in the top-right corner of the screen when you have a status effect.
Show the item name when switching to a new item in the hotbar.
Hides the fullscreen overlay that shows when the player is in a Nether Portal.
Hides the fire overlay that shows when the player is on fire in first person.
Hides the wither bossbars that appear from the Wither Armor ability in Skyblock.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.subc: Make Minecraft feel like 1.8 again! These options apply only when 1.8 Mode is enabled.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.oldV: Enables blocking with swords. Feels just like 1.8. This is cosmetic only, and does not actually block damage.
Currently only applies to the sword blocking animation.
Disables the "attack strength" indicator below the crosshair. Works in sync with the native Minecraft setting.
Changes the crouching behavior back to match pre-1.14 crouching. This is useful on Hypixel, as hitting your head on a ceiling while crouching won't lag you back with this setting on.
Changes the hitbox of glass panes to match pre-1.14 glass panes. This is useful for gemstone mining, as it removes the 1x1 pixel glass pane "stubs."
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.hide: Hides the fire overlay that shows on entities.
config.ae.skydoppler.dungeon.option.hide: Hides only the player's mage beam, not everyone else's. Disable firework particles if you want to hide all mage beams.
config.ae.skydoppler.fishing.option.hide: Hide players while fishing. This is useful in crowded areas like the hub during a Fishing Festival.
Range (in blocks) around the player that players will be hidden. This only applies when Hide Players While Fishing is enabled.
Hides fishing rod lines and bobbers that aren't owned by the player. This is useful as it declutters the screen in crowded areas like Fishing Hotspots.
config.ae.skydoppler.fishing.option.doLe: Shows a title on screen and plays a sound when a legendary sea creature is caught by the player. Customizable when enabled.
config.ae.skydoppler.general.option.subc: These options allow you to choose what happens when a legendary sea creature is caught.
config.ae.skydoppler.fishing.option.seac: Hide the original chat message sent by the game.
Send a simplified chat message in the chat. This does not replace the original message.
Show a title on screen when a legendary sea creature is caught.
Play a ding sound when a legendary sea creature is caught.
config.ae.skydoppler.helditem.title: Held Item Renderer Config
config.ae.skydoppler.helditem.exit.toolt: Everything is saved automatically, so you can just exit.
config.ae.skydoppler.inventory.option.do: Prevents moving or dropping locked slots in your inventory.
Disable Slot Locking in Storage UI
When enabled, allows moving or dropping locked slots in the storage GUI (Ender Chest, Backpacks), even though Slot Locking is still enabled.
config.ae.skydoppler.inventory.option.sl: Adjusts the volume of the sound played when toggling slot locking. Set to 0 to disable the sound.
skydoppler.locked_slot.attempt_drop: You cannot drop a locked slot!
config.ae.skydoppler.chatnotification.en: Enable or disable this chat matching function
config.ae.skydoppler.chatnotification.pl: Play a sound when this chat pattern is matched
config.ae.skydoppler.chatnotification.hi: Hide the original chat message when this pattern is matched
skydoppler.save_and_exit.tooltip: Saves all changes and returns to the module list.
skydoppler.undo_all_changes.tooltip: Reverts all changes made just now back to what they were before you just opened this config screen.
config.ae.skydoppler.main_config.title: Main Configuration
config.ae.skydoppler.main_config.categor: Sends a chat message and plays a sound when the player transfer cooldown finishes in Hypixel Skyblock (~3 seconds).
Hide players that are far away from you in hubs to improve performance and visibility.
Choose where to hide far players (Village Only, Entire Hub, etc.).
Distance in blocks beyond which players will be hidden.
Hide players near NPCs to make accessing crowded NPCs easier.
Range in blocks around NPCs where players will be hidden.
Automatically sprint when moving forward without holding the sprint key.
Limit always sprint to only work in Skyblock servers.
Hide all explosion particle effects to improve performance.
Toggle fog rendering. Disabling improves performance and visibility.
Makes everything maximum brightness (light level 15). Useful for dungeons and dark areas.
Hide clouds in the sky to improve performance.
Disable the night vision overlay effect in the sky and fog.
Hide the fire overlay that appears on entities when they're on fire.
Hide the colored indicators that appear on the left of chat messages.
Hide the vanilla health bar (hearts) above the hotbar.
Hide hunger, armor, and air bubble bars above the hotbar (unused in Skyblock).
Hide status effect icons in the top-right corner of the screen.
Hide the item name tooltip when switching items in the hotbar.
Hide the health bar that appears when riding mounts (horses, pigs, etc.).
Hide the fullscreen overlay that appears when in a Nether Portal.
Hide the fire overlay when the player is on fire in first person view.
Hide wither bossbars from Wither Armor ability in Skyblock.
Make dropped items glow with their rarity color.
Make all players glow with their server-assigned glow color.
Enable sword blocking like in 1.8 (cosmetic only, doesn't actually block damage).
Use pre-1.14 crouching behavior to prevent lag when hitting ceilings while crouched.
Hide only your own mage beams, not other players' beams.
Hide fishing rod lines and bobbers from other players to declutter the screen.
Hide players while fishing to reduce distractions in crowded areas.
Range in blocks around the player where other players will be hidden while fishing.
Show alerts when catching legendary sea creatures.
Hide the original game chat message when a legendary sea creature is caught.
Send a custom simplified chat message when a legendary sea creature is caught.
Display a title on screen when a legendary sea creature is caught.
Play a sound when a legendary sea creature is caught.
Prevent moving or dropping locked inventory slots.
Allow moving locked slots in storage UIs (Ender Chest, Backpacks) even when slot locking is enabled.
Volume of the sound played when toggling slot locking. Set to 0 to disable.
